page.title: 10HEMINGBY PLAY GROUP.
page.content: Play group was set up by Mrs Burbage and Mrs Walker four years ago.The main helpers are Mrs Portas , Mrs Barnard , Mrs Ashcroft and Mrs Gulliver. All the helpers have to be registered but not trained.Play group is on Mondays and Thursdays.On Mondays there are nineteen children. Play group starts at 9.15 and finishes at 12.00. It costs sixty five pence for one day and that includes orange and .biscuits. They have cake when it is someones birthday.When they started they only had basic toys like bricks and paints . but now they have a slide ,climbing frame, bricks , trampolene and tunnel. The children start at two and leave when they start school.They have two gunea pigs. They have a choice of painting or colouring.After break they play games and sing .Then before they go home they have a story.
